research_metadata.focus: Bootstrap startup failures and competitive disadvantages
research_metadata.scenario: October 2026 - 12 months after launch - FAILURE postmortem

bootstrap_failure_rate.implication: Bootstrap has WORSE odds than VC-backed

solo_founder_failure_rate.context: Lack of diverse skills and perspectives increases challenges

profitability_timeline.context: 6 months considered very optimistic end of spectrum

technical_debt_burden.implication: Solo founder will spend half time on maintenance

event_planner_specific.implication: Event organizers may resist AI tools

ai_flyer_generator_competition.canva_magic_design: Market leader, generates designs in seconds
ai_flyer_generator_competition.implication: Saturated market with FREE options - why pay What's Poppin?

cac_zero_reality.context: SafetyCulture, Calendly, Grammarly took YEARS to build
cac_zero_reality.implication: Organic takes 2-3 years minimum to scale

viral_loop_requirements.implication: Viral loop requires product excellence from Day 1

qr_code_effectiveness.context: Requires strategic placement and clear value
qr_code_effectiveness.implication: QR codes work BUT need high event volume

event_organizer_willingness_to_pay.implication: Market expects premium pricing OR per-transaction model

stripe_margins.implication: Subscription model better than per-event for margins

saas_margin_benchmarks.implication: Must maintain >70% margins to be viable

gcp_free_tier_limits.traffic_spike_quotas: System blocks access when quota exceeded
gcp_free_tier_limits.hidden_costs: $0.10/GB for internal IP traffic between zones
gcp_free_tier_limits.implication: One viral event = instant bill, app goes down

postgresql_vs_meilisearch.meilisearch_advantages: Typo tolerance, prefix search, fuzzy matching, real-time
postgresql_vs_meilisearch.implication: Will need Meilisearch by Month 4-6, adds cost

funded_competitor_advantages.speed_and_scale: Bootstrapped grows slower, VC can scale fast
funded_competitor_advantages.market_expansion: Limited to one city vs. multi-city launch
funded_competitor_advantages.customer_loss_risk: Competitors beat on features and costs
funded_competitor_advantages.implication: If Eventbrite or funded startup enters = game over

first_mover_disadvantage.moat_importance: First to market builds massive moat
first_mover_disadvantage.implication: Being second with less money = death sentence

single_city_tam.implication: Single city TAM may be <$1M ARR ceiling

solo_developer_advantages.implication: Good choice for solo dev BUT still 6-12 month build

limitations.implication: Technical debt builds faster as solo dev

pattern_1_runway_cliff.consequence: No capital to continue, forced shutdown

pattern_2_burnout_collapse.trigger: Solo founder works 80+ hours/week for 6+ months

pattern_3_ai_tool_rejection.trigger: Event organizers don't adopt AI flyer generator
pattern_3_ai_tool_rejection.evidence: 51% SMB adoption but events traditionally manual

pattern_4_viral_loop_failure.trigger: QR codes don't drive sufficient user acquisition
pattern_4_viral_loop_failure.evidence: Viral loops take years to optimize, need Day 1 excellence

pattern_5_free_tier_explosion.trigger: Single viral event drives traffic spike
pattern_5_free_tier_explosion.consequence: GCP bills $500+, app goes down due to quotas

pattern_6_funded_competitor_launch.evidence: 82% bootstrap failure rate, can't compete on resources

pattern_7_tam_ceiling.trigger: Single city market too small for profitability

pattern_8_technical_debt_spiral.trigger: Solo dev cuts corners to ship fast
pattern_8_technical_debt_spiral.consequence: 42% time on maintenance, can't add features
pattern_8_technical_debt_spiral.probability: VERY HIGH (91% CTOs cite as biggest challenge)
pattern_8_technical_debt_spiral.evidence: Quality degrades, bugs compound, users churn

research_conclusions.organic_growth_timeline: TOO SLOW - Need 2-3 years for PLG scale
research_conclusions.ai_tool_differentiation: WEAK - Saturated market with free options
research_conclusions.infrastructure_cost_risk: HIGH - Free tier insufficient for viral growth
research_conclusions.overall_assessment: BOOTSTRAP APPROACH HAS FATAL FLAWS - Need runway extension or VC
